description: A measurement or fact record aligned with the Darwin Core MeasurementOrFact class.

main.description: A measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion about an occurrence.

occurrenceRef.description: AT-URI reference to the app.gainforest.dwc.occurrence record.

occurrenceID.description: The occurrenceID of the linked occurrence record.

measurementType.description: The nature of the measurement (e.g., 'DBH', 'tree height', 'canopy cover').

measurementAccuracy.description: The description of the potential error.

measurementMethod.description: The description of or reference to the method used.

measurementDeterminedDate.description: The date the measurement was made.

measurementRemarks.description: Comments or notes accompanying the measurement.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of record creation in the ATProto PDS.
